segment.source: Provides a list by function of some of the controls that you can use in your apps.
segment.target: Provides a list by function of some of the controls that you can use in your apps.

segment.source: The XAML UI framework for Windows provides an extensive library of controls that support UI development.
segment.target: The XAML UI framework for Windows provides an extensive library of controls that support UI development.

segment.source: Some of these controls have a visual representation; others function as the containers for other controls or content, such as images and media.
segment.target: Some of these controls have a visual representation; others function as the containers for other controls or content, such as images and media.

segment.source: You can see many of the Windows UI controls in action by downloading the XAML UI Basics sample.
segment.target: You can see many of the Windows UI controls in action by downloading the XAML UI Basics sample.

segment.source: Here's a list by function of the common XAML controls you can use in your app.
segment.target: Here's a list by function of the common XAML controls you can use in your app.

segment.source: A toolbar for displaying application-specific commands.
segment.target: A toolbar for displaying application-specific commands.

segment.source: A button for showing commands using app bar styling.
segment.target: A button for showing commands using app bar styling.

segment.source: Reference: AppBarButton, SymbolIcon, BitmapIcon, FontIcon, PathIcon
segment.target: Reference: AppBarButton, SymbolIcon, BitmapIcon, FontIcon, PathIcon

segment.source: Design and how-to: App bar and command bar control guide
segment.target: Design and how-to: App bar and command bar control guide

segment.source: Visually separates groups of commands in a command bar.
segment.target: Visually separates groups of commands in a command bar.

segment.source: A button for toggling commands in a command bar.
segment.target: A button for toggling commands in a command bar.

segment.source: A specialized app bar that handles the resizing of app bar button elements.
segment.target: A specialized app bar that handles the resizing of app bar button elements.

segment.source: Design and how-to: App bar and command bar control guide
segment.target: Design and how-to: App bar and command bar control guide

segment.source: A control that responds to user input and raises a Click event.
segment.target: A control that responds to user input and raises a Click event.

segment.source: Design and how-to: Buttons control guide
segment.target: Design and how-to: Buttons control guide

segment.source: A button that appears as marked up text and opens the specified URI in a browser.
segment.target: A button that appears as marked up text and opens the specified URI in a browser.

segment.source: Design and how-to: Hyperlinks control guide
segment.target: Design and how-to: Hyperlinks control guide

segment.source: A button that raises its Click event repeatedly from the time it's pressed until it's released.
segment.target: A button that raises its Click event repeatedly from the time it's pressed until it's released.

segment.source: Design and how-to: Buttons control guide
segment.target: Design and how-to: Buttons control guide

segment.source: A control that presents a collection of items that the user can flip through, one item at a time.
segment.target: A control that presents a collection of items that the user can flip through, one item at a time.

segment.source: Design and how-to: Flip view control guide
segment.target: Design and how-to: Flip view control guide

segment.source: A control that presents a collection of items in rows and columns that can scroll horizontally.
segment.target: A control that presents a collection of items in rows and columns that can scroll horizontally.

segment.source: A control that presents a collection of items in a UI specified by a data template.
segment.target: A control that presents a collection of items in a UI specified by a data template.

segment.source: A control that presents a collection of items in a list that can scroll vertically.
segment.target: A control that presents a collection of items in a list that can scroll vertically.

segment.source: A control that lets a user select a date using a drop-down calendar display.
segment.target: A control that lets a user select a date using a drop-down calendar display.

segment.source: A calendar date picker with open calendar view
segment.target: A calendar date picker with open calendar view

segment.source: Design and how-to: Calendar, date, and time controls
segment.target: Design and how-to: Calendar, date, and time controls

segment.source: A configurable calendar display that lets a user select single or multiple dates.
segment.target: A configurable calendar display that lets a user select single or multiple dates.

segment.source: Design and how-to: Calendar, date, and time controls
segment.target: Design and how-to: Calendar, date, and time controls

segment.source: A control that lets a user select a date.
segment.target: A control that lets a user select a date.

segment.source: Design and how-to: Calendar, date, and time controls
segment.target: Design and how-to: Calendar, date, and time controls

segment.source: A control that lets a user set a time value.
segment.target: A control that lets a user set a time value.

segment.source: Design and how-to: Calendar, date, and time controls
segment.target: Design and how-to: Calendar, date, and time controls

segment.source: See Menu flyout and Popup menu.
segment.target: See Menu flyout and Popup menu.

segment.source: Displays a message that requires user interaction.
segment.target: Displays a message that requires user interaction.

segment.source: (Unlike a dialog, a flyout does not create a separate window, and does not block other user interaction.)
segment.target: (Unlike a dialog, a flyout does not create a separate window, and does not block other user interaction.)

segment.source: Design and how-to: Context menus and dialogs
segment.target: Design and how-to: Context menus and dialogs

segment.source: Temporarily displays a list of commands or options related to what the user is currently doing.
segment.target: Temporarily displays a list of commands or options related to what the user is currently doing.

segment.source: Design and how-to: Context menus and dialogs
segment.target: Design and how-to: Context menus and dialogs

segment.source: Sample code: XAML Context Menu sample
segment.target: Sample code: XAML Context Menu sample

segment.source: A custom menu that presents commands that you specify.
segment.target: A custom menu that presents commands that you specify.

segment.source: Design and how-to: Context menus and dialogs
segment.target: Design and how-to: Context menus and dialogs

segment.source: A pop-up window that displays information for an element.
segment.target: A pop-up window that displays information for an element.

segment.source: Design and how-to: Guidelines for tooltips
segment.target: Design and how-to: Guidelines for tooltips

segment.source: A control that presents an image.
segment.target: A control that presents an image.

segment.source: Design and how-to: Image and ImageBrush
segment.target: Design and how-to: Image and ImageBrush

segment.source: A control that receives and displays ink strokes.
segment.target: A control that receives and displays ink strokes.

segment.source: Various retained mode graphical objects that can be presented like ellipses, rectangles, lines, Bezier paths, etc.
segment.target: Various retained mode graphical objects that can be presented like ellipses, rectangles, lines, Bezier paths, etc.

segment.source: Sample code: XAML vector-based drawing sample
segment.target: Sample code: XAML vector-based drawing sample

segment.source: A container control that draws a border, background, or both, around another object.
segment.target: A container control that draws a border, background, or both, around another object.

segment.source: A layout panel that supports the absolute positioning of child elements relative to the top left corner of the canvas.
segment.target: A layout panel that supports the absolute positioning of child elements relative to the top left corner of the canvas.

segment.source: A layout panel that supports the arranging of child elements in rows and columns.
segment.target: A layout panel that supports the arranging of child elements in rows and columns.

segment.source: A panel that lets you position and align child objects in relation to each other or the parent panel.
segment.target: A panel that lets you position and align child objects in relation to each other or the parent panel.

segment.source: You don't typically use it as a stand-alone control.)
segment.target: You don't typically use it as a stand-alone control.)

segment.source: A container control that lets the user pan and zoom its content.
segment.target: A container control that lets the user pan and zoom its content.

segment.source: Design and how-to: Scroll and panning controls guide
segment.target: Design and how-to: Scroll and panning controls guide

segment.source: Sample code: XAML scrolling, panning and zooming sample
segment.target: Sample code: XAML scrolling, panning and zooming sample

segment.source: A layout panel that arranges child elements into a single line that can be oriented horizontally or vertically.
segment.target: A layout panel that arranges child elements into a single line that can be oriented horizontally or vertically.

segment.source: A layout panel that supports the arranging of child elements in rows and columns.
segment.target: A layout panel that supports the arranging of child elements in rows and columns.

segment.source: Each child element can span multiple rows and columns.
segment.target: Each child element can span multiple rows and columns.

segment.source: Variable sized wrap grid layout panel
segment.target: Variable sized wrap grid layout panel

segment.source: A container control that scales its content to a specified size.
segment.target: A container control that scales its content to a specified size.

segment.source: A control that plays audio and video content.
segment.target: A control that plays audio and video content.

segment.source: Design and how-to: Media element control guide
segment.target: Design and how-to: Media element control guide

segment.source: A control that provides playback controls for a MediaElement.
segment.target: A control that provides playback controls for a MediaElement.

segment.source: Design and how-to: Media element control guide
segment.target: Design and how-to: Media element control guide

segment.source: Sample code: Media Transport Controls sample
segment.target: Sample code: Media Transport Controls sample

segment.source: A container control that lets the user view and navigate to different sections of content.
segment.target: A container control that lets the user view and navigate to different sections of content.

segment.source: Design and how-to: Hub control guide
segment.target: Design and how-to: Hub control guide

segment.source: A full-screen container and navigation model that also provides a quick way to move between different pivots (views or filters), typically in the same set of data.
segment.target: A full-screen container and navigation model that also provides a quick way to move between different pivots (views or filters), typically in the same set of data.

segment.source: The Pivot control can be styled to have a "tab" layout.
segment.target: The Pivot control can be styled to have a "tab" layout.

segment.source: Design and how-to: Tabs and pivot control guide
segment.target: Design and how-to: Tabs and pivot control guide

segment.source: A container control that lets the user zoom between two views of a collection of items.
segment.target: A container control that lets the user zoom between two views of a collection of items.

segment.source: Design and how-to: Semantic zoom control guide
segment.target: Design and how-to: Semantic zoom control guide

segment.source: Sample code: XAML GridView grouping and SemanticZoom sample
segment.target: Sample code: XAML GridView grouping and SemanticZoom sample

segment.source: A container control with two views; one view for the main content and another view that is typically used for a navigation menu.
segment.target: A container control with two views; one view for the main content and another view that is typically used for a navigation menu.

segment.source: Design and how-to: Split view control guide
segment.target: Design and how-to: Split view control guide

segment.source: A container control that hosts web content.
segment.target: A container control that hosts web content.

segment.target: Design and how-to: Guidelines for Web views

segment.target: Sample code: XAML WebView control sample

segment.source: A control that indicates progress by displaying a bar.
segment.target: A control that indicates progress by displaying a bar.

segment.source: A progress bar that shows a specific value.
segment.target: A progress bar that shows a specific value.

segment.target: A progress bar that shows indeterminate progress.

segment.target: Design and how-to: Progress controls guide

segment.target: Design and how-to: Progress controls guide

segment.source: A drop-down list of items a user can select from.
segment.target: A drop-down list of items a user can select from.

segment.source: A control that presents an inline list of items that the user can select from.
segment.target: A control that presents an inline list of items that the user can select from.

segment.source: A control that allows a user to select a single option from a group of options.
segment.target: A control that allows a user to select a single option from a group of options.
